website_summaries.verdict: The Wave Horizon 3 from Mizuno has effectively delivered a high-performing running shoe for overpronators, as evidenced in the positive reviews it received. The majority of its wearers praised the shoe’s comfort, versatility, and reliability, with some particularly noting the efficiency of the features. There was very few negative feedback towards the shoe; thus, it can be concluded that the Mizuno Wave Horizon 3 was a well-liked shoe that is definitely worth the purchase.
pros: Most wearers mentioned the comfortable midsole of the Mizuno Wave Horizon 3
A lot of runners found the Wave Horizon 3 to be reliable enough for daily activities
The stability feature of the shoe was praised by several users
Many buyers considered the shoe as lightweight
The shoe provided an accurate fit, according to some commenters
Some users claimed the Wave Horizon 3 did not require a break-in period
The outsole’s tread gave sturdy and reliable traction even on wet surfaces, according to a reviewer
cons: A couple of wearers thought the Wave Horizon 3 was not a fast shoe

customer_reviews.title: Better than Asics
customer_reviews.text: I walk three miles most days. For years, I have been wearing Asics walking shoes with Good Feet inserts. And while they felt OK, I noticed lately that they were causing my toes to scrunch together because the inserts were pushing them forward. I took the problem to the local Pacers store and a terrific salesman suggested these instead because they have the arch support insert inside. It's been two months and they are comfortable and don't scrunch my toes. They also seem to have better workmanship than the Asics. So I just bought a second pair to alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Shoe reviews are subjective but comfortable for my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm flat footed with my foot width being right between medium and wide widths. My normal size for most shoes is 11.5. These fit true to size and had a little more width than most shoes but I appreciated that. Very comfortable and supportive. Stiff sole but not so much that it fatigued your feet. I thought they were wonderful for my unique feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jkb

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and well padded shoes. No forefoot pain with Wave Horizon.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Mizuno Wave Horizon shoes that I have used for training/running. I had over 300 miles on my last pair, so it was time for a replacement. The reason I love these shoes is that they are very stable and there is plenty of cushion in the front portion of the foot. Other shoes left my forefoot bruised feeling after long runs. I have never had that problem with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Ok.. Previous models were more stable.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as stable as previous versions of the Wave Horizon 3... The foam broke down. I've had to replace them...
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Mizuno's exclusively for the last 5 years for running because they've always fit great and were really comfortable. I took a shot at these even though they were a bit more than I usually pay. I was not rewarded by that decision. I find they don't fit as snug as other Wave models I've had. Therefore they feel more "slippery", i.e. my foot moves around slightly even though they are the correct size. I also found them overall less comfortable and caused some foot aggravations that their other models do not. Next time I will stick with the less fancy but far more comfortable models.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good support shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good support shoe. The heel has nice cushion and the support in the mid-section of the shoe is very good. Only complaint is the shoe runs a bit narrow so if you have a wider foot but don't quite wear E you might not like the fit in the middle, but I have found after wearing them for a bit that portion of the shoe breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Blister on 1st Day?!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of using first time for running I used it for walking (since I ran the previous day with my old one), and got blisters on the sole of both feet. Yes, never got blisters there ever. Maybe the shoe is only designed for running, not walking. Will post another one when I do run...!
customer_reviews.author: Amilcar

customer_reviews.title: Great all around and running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a new pair of running shoes in a while. The grey pair is sporty enough but can also be pulled off when trying to look a little less sporty for travel and outdoor events. The shoes felt incredible from day 1. I was worried about the extra fabric around the ankle but it’s not that noticeable and adds some comfort.
customer_reviews.author: AndyWalker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a 14 w and it is hard to find him a perfect fit. This one fitted like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair in a row where the Eyelit on the left shoe Broke
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. i had to return the first pair because the eyelid broke on the left shoe. I ordered another pair and the same thing happened. I haven't had these shoes 2 months . And now i am stuck with an overpriced pair of shoes that are comfortable but they fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno Quality is top notch fit and stability are great.
customer_reviews.text: When buying mizuno please use there website to determine your exact model needed for your foot and knee geometry. And you will not be disappointed in the shoe you get. these shoe took me from a jogger to a runner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Road Shoes I have Run In
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have slightly wider feet and these are the best road shoes I have ever bought. I put about 300 miles on them before retiring the first pair to walking shoes, but they have hardly worn out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with this purchase. He always wore New Balance but reviewed this brand and figured it was worth checking out. He LOVES them and brags on the comfort level all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Early Model.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I did purchase this for the orginal retail price. Very stiff and uncomfortable after a little over a mile in my run. Had enough after giving this two runs. Returned and got my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Max Stability Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I like max stability shoes for my long runs. I normally use Asics Kayano, but these Wave Horizons were a great deal so took a chance, and they are working out very well. On my 2nd pair! Great support and cushioning. Love the 11 mm heel to toe drop.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Durability non-existent.  Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Barely a month after buying them, the lining of the shoe ripped open, and now they give me a blister every time I use them rendering them unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give these a try after owning Brooks the last couple of years. So glad I did. They are extremely comfortable and are very stable for my fit. I’m officially a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Conde

customer_reviews.title: Love Mizuno
customer_reviews.text: I love the Mizuno top stability sneakers, and they seem to have a lot of room in the toe area. Perfect sneaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd pair - Mizuno continues to impress
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Mizuno running shoes. These are comfortable, supportive, and sturdy running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but far from durable.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes I. The past and bought them agin for their comfort and durability. I walk between four and five miles per day and switch between two different pairs of shoes. I started wearing these as part of that rotation on April 1, 2020. Now here I am 2 1/2 months later with fraying top edges and toes beginning to show through on top. How can that be?
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if Mizuno knows what 11.5 M means. Because the shoe size I received was half a size too small.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wombaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to find a good running shoe and this shoes took care of my knee and back pain
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Do not have foot lateral support
customer_reviews.text: Those walking shoes are uncomfortable and do not have lateral stability. I lost my money.
customer_reviews.author: Max Oliveras

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very cushy feel with good stability. Better than the Nimbus shoe of late.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Fox

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the tennis shoe and material is excellent. These shoes are very comfortable to wear and when working out they perform as stated. Any one who is looking of a high quality running shoe this brand delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in support
customer_reviews.text: Loved my prior two pairs of mizunos. These, however provide uneven inconsistent support on the outside of the heel on both shoes pushing the foot off the outside of the shoes. Really uncomfortable to walk around in for any period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lmb from stl

customer_reviews.title: One size smaller than the order
customer_reviews.text: The product came perfect in time and without faults, but I ordered in 10.5 size and came in 10 size.
customer_reviews.author: salva

customer_reviews.title: best sneakers ever
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are so comfortable and I love them. I am flat footed and use them for running. The best sneakers I've ever bought in my life.
customer_reviews.author: james chang

customer_reviews.title: Very Poorly Finished...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed this time with Mizuno.. I don't know if maybe were this pair but I'm returning them right now!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: my first pair of Mizuno awesome 👌
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than my old runners but very good fit and feel while running
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. The cushioning is the best I have ever worn. This is my second pair of WH #3's. I think this shoe is better for me then the new Wave Horizon #4. If you need support and cushioning try this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D

customer_reviews.title: Me likey
customer_reviews.text: Feel good think they shrunk a bit after wash but held up well from wear and wash
customer_reviews.author: Brian T Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and great for high stability. Nice shoes for runners.
customer_reviews.author: Neill

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats Wave Horizon Mizuno.
customer_reviews.text: When you need a running shoes you need Wave Horizon Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.text: I feel larger a little bit, but in use, it’s comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Stable, comfortable, sturdy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. They help reduce my over pronation. I wear these for long runs and they keep my legs from being fatigued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of the Mizuno Wave Horizon 3, the first pair lasted me for about a year being woren almost every day. Mizuno makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: They are a little snug but great arch support for overpronating.
customer_reviews.author: Addison W.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy runner choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been running for years. Mizuno and ASICS have always been my go to shoes. Being a heavy runner, 230lb guy, they’ve been the shoe to hold up for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really nice running shoes, very light. Nice colors and good materials
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Antonio Aguinaga

customer_reviews.title: AMZING LOOK AND FIT!
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday present for my dad, and he LOVED them! So comfy, lightweight, and his favorite pair by far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Horizon 3 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Push the limit of performance running and take it to the next level. Our most technically advanced support shoe is equipped with Mizuno Wave technology and a highly cushioned U4icX/U4ic midsole, providing an unprecedented level of comfort – while giving you a supportive and cushioned ride. The new upper features our new aerohug technology that wraps around your foot to eliminate space between you and the shoe while running, resulting in a highly adaptive and comfortable fit.
feature_bullets: MIZUNO WAVE: Wave sets the standard for running shoe technologies.
This stability favorite uses a fan shaped CLOUDWAVE to prevent overpronation before it happens, while offering a cushioned ride at the same time.

The Wave Horizon 3 is the softest, most stable ride in the Mizuno lineup which will keep you supported and efficient with SmoothRide technology to create a smooth transition from heel to toe on every step.
New Premium Sockliner for added comfort
Engineered Mesh Upper: Both breathable and durable for high performance.
